channel.title: "Do not enter!"
channel.description: How bout, to help stop people who want private server help and such, make a page after agreeing to the TOS(Since nobody seems to read them), saying clearly and in very bold letters, "If you want help with Moparscape, go to [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf]here[/url]" Or something like that. Because it seems they increase in size as more topics become locked.

item.title: "Do not enter!"
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

I decided to actually make a new tos, just to show you all what it could look like, but Kane beat me to it, mines nearly the same, just has an extra page. Mines doesn’t have the extra questionnaire either, but it works, Kind of. I didn’t feel like make the radio buttons actually control what website you go to, I just kind of put them there to help with the design of the site.

http://www.clansierra.info/tos/tos.html
http://www.clansierra.info/tos/tos2.html
http://www.clansierra.info/tos/help.html

I’m going to add more to that help page, but I kind of wanted to just give a preview of it. The way it would work is the MoparScaper visits the TOS, he hits moparscape (Which is pre-checked) he types in “yes”. and it sends him to the help page, where he can get detailed information, can download the client, and even gets some answers to frequently asked questions, I used the download moparscape button, because it may be familiar with moparscape players, I also added a similiar forum button. I in the end will also add an online client button. The Times New Roman font isn’t permanent, but it’s large, and easy to read, I may switch it over to Veranda, and bold it, or I may switch it to Myriad Pro.

Read full topic

Domain change ftw. Make the 2 sites seem completely separate.[/quote]

Like making them read it every day and auto delete cookie after a day is better

item.title: "Do not enter!"
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:12, topic:136188”]Change the name of one of the communities and therefore remove the link between the two.

People only come here because moparscape and moparisthebest sound similar. I bet half of them don’t even know what a “Mopar” is. If this community became rscn2.com (bad example i know) then there would be no link and no-one would think to go there for help. Ofcourse you’d have to get the new domain name, transfer everything, redirect mitb.com to the new domain for a few weeks and then close the redirect so that moparisthebest no longer exists. The bridge will be destroyed and all should be fixed.[/quote]
There is only one problem.
People will link others to Moparisthebest lol.
Or moparisthebest’s name will link to to these forums.

frank_:

if you had half an idea how much people on moparscape suck, you would want it deleted too. you dont, though, because you are one of them

I know, and your the best person on earth right? [size=3pt]STFU pls[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: "Do not enter!"
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Change the name of one of the communities and therefore remove the link between the two.

People only come here because moparscape and moparisthebest sound similar. I bet half of them don’t even know what a “Mopar” is. If this community became rscn2.com (bad example i know) then there would be no link and no-one would think to go there for help. Ofcourse you’d have to get the new domain name, transfer everything, redirect mitb.com to the new domain for a few weeks and then close the redirect so that moparisthebest no longer exists. The bridge will be destroyed and all should be fixed.
